definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: She was much looked up to for her kindnesses .
sentences.chinese: 她因多行善事而受人尊敬。

sentences.english: She is a lady who is hallowed in the town.
sentences.chinese: 在该市她是一名受人尊敬的女士。

sentences.english: Instead, they honored him, by adopting the breed as the official firehouse mascot.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们尊敬它，用它来作为消防队的正式吉祥物。

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教学期间将武之奥妙之处传给师生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: But in a culture that reveres age, some villagers refer to him dismissively as a "lad".
sentences.chinese: 在尊敬长者的文化中，一些村民对他轻蔑的称为青年。

sentences.english: In China, respect for your elders, for your forbears , is even more important than making money.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，尊敬老人和列祖列宗要比赚钱更为重要。

sentences.english: Usted and ustedes are respectful and formal words used to express you , in the singular and plural forms.
sentences.chinese: 您和您们是正式和尊敬的称呼，有单数和复数之分。

sentences.english: We should respect our teachers. You shouldn't have answered your teacher back in class。
sentences.chinese: 我们应当尊敬老师，你不该在课上同老师顶嘴。

sentences.english: Who was this foreigner who was treated with such reverence?
sentences.chinese: 这位如此受尊敬的外国人是谁呢？

sentences.english: I adjudge him unworthy of esteem .
sentences.chinese: 我认为他不值得我尊敬。

sentences.english: All you have accomplished, honourable teacher, for my backward daughter!
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的老师，小女浅陋无知，承蒙您教诲。

sentences.english: President Jacques de Boisséson, Ladies and Gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的戴杰会长，女士们，先生们。

sentences.english: Rise in the presence of the age, show respect for the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 在白发人面前你要站起来，要尊敬老人。

sentences.english: Christ, whose Nativity Milton is honoring, is still just a baby.
sentences.chinese: 弥尔顿所尊敬的基督还只是个婴儿。

sentences.english: He was respected for his learning by several churchmen and other gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 学识博得了一些牧师和其他绅士们的尊敬。

sentences.english: I am confident and have belief the team will be focused and treat Twente with respect.
sentences.chinese: 我有信心，球队将会集中精力，尊敬对手特文特队。

definition: to admire/to revere/to look up to
to love and respect/love and respect
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
